instruction: Generate song lyrics that express love and longing.
output:
Verse 1:
Every night I lie awake
And count the stars up in the sky
Hoping that some day I'll find you
And find out why I feel so alive

Chorus:
Time keeps passing by
But my longing doesn't die
A love so strong, so hard to find
I'm searching for you all the time

Verse 2:
And when I'm lost in the dark
My thoughts drift off to our past
Your beauty like the morning sun
Your gentle touch, my only one

Chorus:
Time keeps passing by
But my longing doesn't die
A love so strong, so hard to find
I'm searching for you all the time

Bridge:
And when the sun sinks in the west
And the stars come in to view
I'll close my eyes, dream of you
And the love that feels so true

Chorus:
Time keeps passing by
But my longing doesn't die
A love so strong, so hard to find
I'm searching for you all the time
